name: Jumping Pig 2
description:
Jumping Pig 2  is a classic platformer game. 

Jump through exciting platforms, avoid obstacles and reach the top in time.

Get thrilling experience of jumping.

Enjoy a challenging adventure!

JUMPING PIG 2 FEATURES ARE- 

- Easy intuitive gameplay. 
- Challenging levels. 
- Avoid collisions with obstacles.
- Collect lots of coins.
- Amazing graphics.
- Reach the top in time.

Instructions to play: 

Left and Right to move the character.

Enter to Pause and to Un-Pause the game.
